sentences.en: And especially will not fantasize about a particular person who embodies all these things.
sentences.cn: 并且不去幻想认识那个“一月一日星期六”-------具有以上所有特性的男人.

sentences.en: And the author loved to addict to fantasize the world, also having its reasons inside.
sentences.cn: 而作者沉迷于幻想世界, 个中也有其缘由.

sentences.en: Don't fantasize about big brother: I am only legend.
sentences.cn: 别迷恋哥,哥只是个传说.

sentences.en: He likes to fantasize that he have win a gold medal.
sentences.cn: 他好想入非非,觉得自己赢了一块金牌.

sentences.en: I often fantasize about living in ways that are quite different from my actual life.
sentences.cn: 我总是幻想以那种与现实截然不同的方式生活.

sentences.en: I tried to fantasize about Christine: those wondering blue eyes, that coppery red hair of hers.
sentences.cn: 我对克里斯蒂娜想入非非：她那双充满好奇的蓝眼睛、那头红棕色的秀发令人着迷。

sentences.en: Maybe you fantasize about working for yourself as you ease into retirement.
sentences.cn: 也许你幻想自己的工作为自己你缓解退休.

sentences.en: Pisces, you're seeking a vacation getaway that allows you to drift, dream and fantasize.
sentences.cn: “双鱼们”, 你们在寻求一次可以让你们尽情漂流 、 做梦、幻想的旅程.

sentences.en: So you fantasize, and eventually, the fantasy's not enough and you relapse.
sentences.cn: 你幻想, 而且最后, 幻想已经不够了所以你有故态复萌了.

sentences.en: What do you fantasize and dream about?
When you fantasize 3 -, it always about the man who's already in your life.
sentences.cn: 当你胡思乱想时, 你想到的总是已经进入你生活的那个男人.

sentences.en: When you fantasize 3 -, it's always about the man whoalready in your life. Well, almost always.
sentences.cn: 当你胡思乱想时, 你想到的总是已经进入你生活的那个男人. 或者说, 差不多总是.

sentences.en: When you fantasize, it's always about the man who's already in your life.
sentences.cn: 当你胡思乱想时, 你想的总是已经进入你生活的那个男人.

sentences.en: Will be I too will fantasize.

words.tran_cn: 想像中地；奇特地；难以置信地
幻想曲；集成曲；幻想作品
幻想家；梦想家；脾气古怪的人
耽于幻想；奏幻想曲（等于phantasy）

trans.tran_en: to imagine that you are doing something which is very pleasant or exciting, but which is very unlikely to happen
